MapReduce is a programming model
MapReduce is used for processing
MapReduce can handle large datasets
Processing with MapReduce is efficient
Large datasets need MapReduce
Processing data requires careful planning
MapReduce helps with distributed computing
Distributed systems use MapReduce
MapReduce was developed by Google
Google uses MapReduce for search
Processing large datasets requires MapReduce
MapReduce makes parallel processing easier
Parallel processing improves performance
Large scale processing needs MapReduce
MapReduce scales horizontally well
